response.original_title: The Second Coming - As Told In The Book of Revelation
response.overview: "The Second Coming" is a groundbreaking A.I. photo-realistic film that brings to life the prophecies of Revelation with cinematic intensity. Blending scripture with cutting-edge visual effects, the film depicts the return of Jesus Christ in a breathtaking vision of hope, judgment, and ultimate redemption for humanity.
response.tagline: “Witness the return of Christ in a photo-realistic vision of Revelation.”
response.title: The Second Coming - As Told In The Book of Revelation
